item.title: My First (talker)
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

[center]Well i decided i would learn scar as ive heard its pretty easy and i started this morning and i worked on a script[/center]

[code=cpp]// --> Spanks AutoTalker
// --> Setup lines are 15-17
// --> But the text you want to autoed on where it says TextToSay
// --> Timestosay is how many time you want your text to repeat
// --> interval is the time between every repeat 1000 = 1 sec

program blah;

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var typed:integer;

const

Yourtext = ‘Hello Jack’;
Timestosay = 20;
interval = 2000;

procedure auto(Yourtext: string);
begin
TypeSend(Yourtext);
end;

procedure ohmyallah;
begin
sleep(interval)
Auto(YourText);
SendKeys(chr(13))
typed:=typed+1
end;

begin
repeat
ohmyallah;
until(typed = Timestosay);
Writeln(‘Thanks for using spankjavas autotalker’);
end.[/code]

Read full topic
